  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.addBoolean(boolean)
    Use add(value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.addInt(int)
    Use add(value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.get(int, Object)
    Use get(index, Object.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.getBoolean(int, boolean)
    Use get(index, Boolean.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.getDate(int, Date)
    Use get(index, Date.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.getInt(int, int)
    Use get(index, Integer.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.getString(int, String)
    Use get(index, String.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.setBoolean(int, boolean)
    Use set(index, value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Array.setInt(int, int)
    Use set(index, value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.get(String, Object)
    Use get(key, Object.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.getBoolean(String, boolean)
    Use get(key, Boolean.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.getDate(String, Date)
    Use get(key, Date.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.getInt(String, int)
    Use get(key, Integer.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.getString(String, String)
    Use get(key, String.class, defaultValue) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.setBoolean(String, boolean)
    Use set(key, value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.data.Dict.setInt(String, int)
    Use set(key, value) with auto-boxing instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.AddOnProcedure
    Use org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure API instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.call(Procedure, Object[])
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.call(Procedure, Bindings)
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallContext.reserve(Procedure)
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.bottom()
    Use CallStack.top(int) with stack height instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.contains(Procedure)
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.toArray()
    Use CallStack.toStackTrace(int) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.CallStack.top()
    Use CallStack.top(int) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor.call(CallContext, Procedure, Bindings)
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Interceptor.reserve(CallContext, Procedure)
    Replaced with org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure signature.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.clearCache()
    Storage cache is used instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.deleteProcedure(String)
    Remove directly from storage instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.getProcedure(String)
    Use load(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.getProcedureNames()
    Query storage directly instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.loadProcedure(String)
    Use load(String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.PATH_PROC
    Use org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure.PATH instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Library.storeProcedure(String, String, Dict)
    Store directly to storage instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.Procedure
    Use org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure API instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.ProcedureException(Procedure, String)
    org.rapidcontext.core.proc.ProcedureException(Procedure, Throwable)
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Channel.report(boolean, String)
    Use Channel.report(long, boolean, String) instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Plugin.KEY_PLATFORM
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Plugin.version(Storage, String)
    Use #version() on the instance instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure.getDescription()
    Use description() instead.
    org.rapidcontext.core.type.Procedure.getName()
    Use id() instead.
